name: Snowmancer
description:
This game is  an entry for the Mini Jam 42:Snow

Channel the powers of the snow to defeat goblins and make your way trough a cold desolate world.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys for movement and directional input
Spacebar - jump
E or Enter - for energy charging
P for pause

Music used
Dancers in the Fire - by Jonny Easton
